title: （轉貼）各大學提供買電腦既優惠計畫整理
content:
係網上見到呢個 source 整理得幾完整
同學仔可以參考下～

Source: https://www.lifetat.com/2019-notebook-ownership/
2019 Notebook Ownership Program
PolyU – Apple, HP, Lenovo, Microsoft
BU – Microsoft, Apple
HKU – Lenovo, HP, Dell, Acer, Apple(Mac program)
HKU Space – TBC
HKUST – TBC
CUHK – Apple
CityU – Samsung, Acer, Apple
OUHK – Asus, Lenovo, Samsung, Apple
LU – TBC
香港教育大學 – TBC
IVE (VTC) – Apple
東華學院(TWC) – Lenovo, Microsoft, Apple
樹仁大學 – Apple
恆商 – Apple
其他消息
可以留意以下網址，雖然依家未更新，但根據往年都會係依個網址更新
Apple Online Store
http://www.apple.com/hk-zh-hiEd/shop
各大院校 Notebook Ownership 代理商
http://www.hknotebook.com/np19/
https://www.eduoffer.com/online/
https://www.mstore.com.hk/default/edustore.html (預計8月中開始)
詳細資料
港大 Hong Kong University notebook ownership programme 2019
Brand: Lenovo, HP, Dell, Acer, Apple (mac program)
學校網頁: http://hkusu.org/notebook/ (8/8開始 可以網上預訂)
Lenovo: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/hku-lenovo/catalog
HP: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/hku-hp/catalog
Dell: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/hku-dell/catalog
Acer: https://www.eduoffer.com/online/edu2019/hku
https://www.eduoffer.com/online/catalog/otherProductList/acer/tor/47
Apple: https://www.eduoffer.com/online/edu2019/hkumac (not notebook ownership / mac program)
CUHK 中大 Notebook Ownership Program 2019
Brand: Apple
學校網頁: https://www.cuhk.edu.hk/price/special/ (未更新)
Apple: https://www.eduoffer.com/online/edu2019/cuhk (8月尾開始)
科大  HKUST Electronics Fiesta 2019
學校網頁: http://su.ust.hk/Notebook.html (未更新)
BU浸會大學 Notebook Ownership 2019
Brand: Microsoft, Apple
Microsoft: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/hkbu-microsoft/catalog
Apple: https://www.eduoffer.com/online/np19/hkbu (16/8開始)
PolyU 理工大學 Notebook Ownership 2019
Brand: Apple, HP, Lenovo, Microsoft
學校網頁: https://www.polyu.edu.hk/its/notebook/np2019
Apple: https://www.hktshop.com/nop/polyu2019 (TBC)
Apple (Poly CPE): https://www.hktshop.com/nop/polyu_cpce2019 (TBC)
CityU 城市大學 Notebook Ownership 2019
Brand: Samsung, Acer, Apple
Apple: https://www.hktshop.com/nop/cityusu2019/
Samsung: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/cityu-samsung/catalog
Acer: https://www.eduoffer.com/online/edu2019/cityu
https://www.eduoffer.com/online/catalog/otherProductList/acer/cg/62?sid=62
OUHK 公開大學 Notebook Ownership 2019
Brand: Asus, Lenovo, Samsung, Apple
Asus: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/ouhk-asus/catalog
Lenovo: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/ouhk-lenovo/catalog
Samsung: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/ouhk-samsung/catalog
Apple: https://www.hktshop.com/nop/ousu2019/
LU 嶺南大學 Notebook Ownership 2019
學校網頁: https://www.ln.edu.hk/notebook/ (未更新)
TWC 東華學院 Notebook Ownership 2019
Brand: Lenovo, Microsoft, Apple
Lenovo: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/twc-lenovo/catalog
Microsoft: https://www.hknotebook.com/np19/twc-microsoft/catalog
Apple:https://www.eduoffer.com/online/catalog/otherProductList/apple/te/32
SYU 樹仁大學 Notebook Ownership 2019
Brand: Apple
Apple: https://www.eduoffer.com/online/edu2019/hksyu (8月尾開始)
HSU 恆商 Notebook Ownership 2019
Brand: Apple
Apple: https://www.hktshop.com/nop/hsusu2019/
VTC IVE Notebook Ownership 2019
Brand: Apple
學校網頁: http://www.vtc.edu.hk/nop/
Apple: http://www.vtc.edu.hk/apple2019 (9/8開始)
excerpt: 係網上見到呢個 source 整理得幾完整，同學仔可以參考下～Source：2019 Notebook Ownership Program，PolyU – Apple， HP， Lenovo， Mic
